user.description:
I think you don't mind that i change json file a bit. Well, a little bit about me.

I'm in the commercial android development about 2 years.
I've got experience at teaching people, solving tasks. Also i spend a lot of time for supporting old project and rewriting big project in a small team.
I've been lead developer for my last commercial project.
For resolve one of companies' task i've learned swift and ios development for around one week and reach high results.
